ing: 1/4 cantaloupe, cut into balls or cubes
2 bananas, peeled and cut into chunks
des: "I was looking for a different way to serve fruit, and it just popped into my head! Why not use fruit skewers?"
ins: Thread the strawberries, cantaloupe, banana and apple pieces alternately onto skewers, placing at least 2 pieces of fruit on each skewer. Arrange the fruit skewers decoratively on a serving platter.
